title: Episode 6: Lucasfilm
itunes:title: Episode 6: Lucasfilm
description: Riding closely on the tails of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Ben and David cover Disney's 2012 acquisition of Lucasfilm. In the episode, they mention Walt Disney's original flywheel diagram, seen below.
